items.value: Romana ordered strange Stuff from the Gang!

Hello nice to see you again!
I am currently waiting for a delivery from the Gang that is around here. Apparently this People have great things for a Party!

And what's new with you and your life?
Haha.. yeh i am the supplier of your Order!
Cool Story, yeh i am busy atm.. see you!

Haha what a coincidence!

Are you working for this Gang now? Wow...
This makes you look much more dangerous!
In the future I better not mess with you.

You get:
â‚¬ 200
it was nice to see you again!

It's a bad joke, isn't it?
You don't have the delivery in your inventory.

You shouldn't be kidding with something like that ...
Oh sorry, will not happen again!
